info.title: IUM-TWEB Project 2023-2024 Query Documentation
info.description: This is the API documentation for the TWEB project for the years 2023-2024. The project is a football site that retrieves data from two servers, one running Express and the other running SpringBoot. Users can make queries to either of these servers or to the server running on port 3000, which contains all the routes for calls to the two servers.

get.summary: Get game events by game ID
get.description: Returns a list of game events for a given game_id. This endpoint is available only on the specified servers.

parameters.name: game_id
parameters.description: The ID of the game for which to get events

get.description: Retrieve details of a game by its ID.

parameters.name: game_id
parameters.description: The ID of the game to retrieve

home_club_goals.description: Goals scored by the home club

away_club_goals.description: Goals scored by the away club

home_club_position.description: Position of the home club in the league

away_club_position.description: Position of the away club in the league

home_club_manager_name.description: Name of the home club manager

away_club_manager_name.description: Name of the away club manager

stadium.description: Stadium where the game was played

get.summary: Retrieve lineups by game ID and club ID

404.description: No lineups found for the given game_id and club_id

500.description: Internal server error or no response from the server

get.description: Retrieve a list of all competitions with ID, name, and country.
Returns a list of matches based on the provided query parameters. This endpoint is available only on the specified server.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season for which to get matches

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which to get matches

home_club_goals.description: Goals scored by the home club

away_club_goals.description: Goals scored by the away club

get.description: Returns a list of distinct competition types. This endpoint is available only on the specified server.
Returns a list of competitions for a given type. This endpoint is available only on the specified server.

404.description: No competitions found for this type

schema.description: No competitions found for this type

get.description: Returns a list of distinct seasons. This endpoint is available only on the specified server.
Returns the last 10 games played on Serie A

home_club_goals.description: Goals scored by the home club

away_club_goals.description: Goals scored by the away club

get.summary: Get the 8 most highest value players
get.description: Returns a list of the highest value players. This endpoint is available only on the specified server.

get.summary: Get top 8 teams by net transfer record
get.description: Returns a list of the top 8 teams based on net transfer record. This endpoint is available only on the specified server.

get.summary: Retrieve player data by player ID

400.description: Bad request, missing required parameters or invalid request

404.description: No data found for the given player ID

500.description: Internal server error or no response from the server

get.summary: Retrieve player season stats by player ID

400.description: Bad request, missing required parameters or invalid request

404.description: No stats found for the given player ID

500.description: Internal server error or no response from the server

get.summary: Retrieve team data by team ID

400.description: Bad request, missing required parameters or invalid request

404.description: No data found for the given team ID

500.description: Internal server error or no response from the server

get.summary: Retrieve team players by team ID

400.description: Bad request, missing required parameters or invalid request

404.description: No players found for the given team ID

500.description: Internal server error or no response from the server

get.summary: Get team stats by competition ID and season
get.description: Returns team stats for a given competition ID and season. This endpoint is available only on the specified server.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season for which to get team stats

totalGoalsFor.description: Total goals scored by the team

totalGoalsAgainst.description: Total goals conceded by the team

404.description: No team stats found for this competition ID and season

example.error: No team stats found for this competition_id and season

get.summary: Get games by competition ID and season
get.description: Returns a list of games for a given competition ID and season. This endpoint is available only on the specified server.

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: The season for which to get games

home_club_goals.description: Goals scored by the home club

away_club_goals.description: Goals scored by the away club

stadium.description: Stadium where the game is played

404.description: No matches found for this competition ID and season

example.error: No matches found for this competition_id and season

get.description: Returns a list of players . This endpoint is available only on the specified server.
